_comment: Example configuration for multiple inverters with individual curtailment control

_explanation.curtailment: Main roof (inverter 0) has curtailment enabled, carport (inverter 1) disabled
_explanation.use_case: Allows curtailing main system while preserving carport production
_explanation.results: opt_res will contain P_PV_curtailment_inv0 and total P_PV_curtailment
